altername_name: Meesterbrein: Een Geheugenspel voor alle leeftijden
name: Meesterbrein
overview: A memory shape matching game released commercially by BBS de Saen in the Netherlands. Guus Hildesheim, who also did the graphics for this game, was sysop of the 'BBS de Saen', a Dutch modem-based bulletin board system (BBS). Translation of title: "Masterbrain - A MEMORY game for all ages".
